item.title: Philosophy
item.author: Author
item.description: Functionalism Functionalism is a theory about the nature of mental states. Based on a theory given by Emile Durkheim Computationalism Socialism Capitalism Materialism Dualism Nihilism The belief in nothing Life is meaningless. Everything in meaningless.
